about_the_game:
Step into the Astromega, the pinnacle of luxury travel, now in two impressive variants! The Astromega shines with its outstanding double-decker design. This unique coach allows you to travel in style throughout Fuerteventura and thanks to its double passenger levels it also offers space for a larger number of travellers. The striking double-decker feature not only gives the Astromega an impressive aesthetic appearance, but also opens up a new level of space and comfort for your passengers!

In the cockpit of the Astromega, the driver experiences an optimal overview in combination with state-of-the-art instrumentation and intuitive operating logic. This innovative design ensures a smooth ride and underlines the exclusive character of this special coach. Expand your fleet with the Astromega and give your travellers an unforgettable journey with luxurious ambience and expanded space!

Variants included:


  • X25
  • X27

Step into the Astromega, the pinnacle of luxury travel, now in two impressive variants! The Astromega shines with its outstanding double-decker design. The striking double-decker feature not only gives the Astromega an impressive aesthetic appearance, but also opens up a new level of space and comfort for your passengers!

In the cockpit of the Astromega, the driver experiences an optimal overview in combination with state-of-the-art instrumentation and intuitive operating logic. This innovative design ensures a smooth ride and underlines the exclusive character of this special coach. Expand your fleet with the Astromega and give your travellers an unforgettable journey with luxurious ambience and expanded space!

name: Tourist Bus Simulator - Astromega

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 950 or Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specifications may change during development.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2060 or Radeon RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Specifications may change during development. Installation on a SDD recommended.

short_description: The Astromega – a top class double-decker that not only shines with its impressive design, but also offers generous space and comfort for a stylish trip across Fuerteventura.
supported_languages:
English, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Russian, Turkish, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Hungarian, Finnish, Japanese, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic*
*languages with full audio support
